philosophies.title: Modularity Over Monolith
philosophies.description: Building systems as a collection of independent, interchangeable components.

philosophies.title: Composability
philosophies.description: Designing components that can be easily combined and recombined to create new functionality.

philosophies.title: Transparency
philosophies.description: Ensuring that the internal state and logic of the system are observable and understandable.

philosophies.title: Efficiency
philosophies.description: Optimizing for performance and resource utilization at every layer of the stack.

philosophies.title: Human-Assisted Automation
philosophies.description: Automating processes while keeping the human in the loop for critical decisions and oversight.

philosophies.title: Security by Default
philosophies.description: Integrating security considerations into the architecture and development process from the start.

philosophies.title: Evolvability
philosophies.description: Designing systems that can adapt and evolve over time to meet new requirements and challenges.
